summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene and Butadiene are mentioned as part of a study evaluating the spatial and temporal trends of lower olefins, including 1,3-butadiene, across Texas from 2002 to 2012. Buta-1,3-diene is essentially another name for 1,3-butadiene, indicating that they refer to the same chemical compound. However, the context does not elaborate on their specific relationship beyond this identification.
